properties.entry: SELECT MOVIE_TITLE FROM MOVIE WHERE MOVIE_NO = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "COMMENT" WHERE COMMENT_FL = 'N' AND MOVIE_NO = ?

SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM( SELECT COMMENT_NO, MEMBER_NM,COMMENT_CT, TO_CHAR(COMMENT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS COMMENT_DT FROM "COMMENT" JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE MOVIE_NO = ? AND COMMENT_FL = 'N' ORDER BY COMMENT_NO DESC )A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COMMENT_NO, COMMENT_CT, COMMENT_DT, COMMENT_FL, MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_NM, PROFILE_IMG FROM "COMMENT" JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE MOVIE_NO = ? ORDER BY COMMENT_NO DESC
